AI Description: PyTorch Geometric is a geometric deep learning extension library for PyTorch. It consists of various methods for deep learning on irregular structures such as graphs, point clouds, and manifolds.
Core Features:
1. Geometric deep learning on graphs, point clouds, and manifolds.
2. Data handling utilities for processing graph data.
3. PyTorch integration for easy use and compatibility.
4. Implementation of various state-of-the-art graph neural networks and geometric deep learning methods.
General Tags: Deep Learning, Graph Neural Networks, Graph Data Processing
